post.body: thanks!
merry xmas to you too!
don't say that, it messes with my world view
oh well can't win em all!
backside. Prayer for the derriere.
my fave is when it's a six lane highway and they slow down to look at an accident *on the other side* Insta-rage.
Yeah, it was just for a second, then I refreshed and all was fine.
ok, as soon as I said that, it did
Nope, I'm good.
Careful what you wish for, somebody'll have to spackle that shit back up.
Just had dinner at a gas station bcuz it was the only thing open. We are classy.
http://twitpic.com/wft9 - Multimedia message
Clearly we have enough presents.
Merry Christmas! Off to family dinner. Holding pumpkin pie while hungry is torture!
http://twitpic.com/unbb - Multimedia message
Ass crack of dawn & I'm thru security @ the airport. Bad time to wonder if I told my parents what time my flight lands.
is finally, finally on vacation. Off to MO in the morning!
of course. of course. it would have been too simple for today to be easy.
is questioning her sanity. :D Also packed and ready to go home to Missouri at the crack of dawn on Sat - only one more day to go!!!
whoever came up with the idea that employees should do their own evaluations s/b shot. Can I just say 'I'm f*#king awesome' & turn it in?
